quotes.quote: David is a quick learner and solved some challenging problems timely.
quotes.title: CEO

quotes.quote: David had a significant impact on our product, solving issues and designing software that allowed us to improve on our deliverable.
quotes.title: Manager

workExperiences.title: Software Developer
descriptions: Project lead and architect for ad-hoc reporting scheduler and data dictionary project, serving over 2000 customers with over 1TB of data being reported
Co-wrote version 2 of ad-hoc reporting system with another developer
Optimized memory usage of ad-hoc reporting system, cut down its memory usage by more than 30%
Mentored 2 junior members within the team
Technologies used: C#, .NET, SQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

workExperiences.title: Technical Consultant
descriptions: Evaluation: Excellent
Applied strong communication, planning, and problem solving skills to provide insurance solution to clients using J2EE, Spring Framework, and SQL
Led the team to optimize their form creation process, cut their form creation process by over 100 hours
Technologies used: Java, J2EE, and SQL

workExperiences.title: Multimedia Systems Designer and Architect
descriptions: Evaluation: Excellent
Applied creativity and prior knowledge of hardware design to optimize simulation by 250% with SVA included
Used C to create highly flexible and maintainable hardware specifications for over 100 architects to use, reduced their delay by 2 weeks
Technologies used: C, Perl, and SystemVerilog

workExperiences.title: Software Development Engineer
descriptions: Evaluation: Excellent
Used previous knowledge of designing, implementation, and testing to improve performance of an embedded software module on a modem chipset by 30% and memory saving by 65%
Created different test cases in C++ to test new implementations including test cases for multi-threading, race conditions, and stack overflow
Technologies used: C, C++, and Python

workExperiences.title: Software Engineer
descriptions: Evaluation: Excellent
Fulfilled the most important role to create a highly efficient and flexible iPhone social networking application using Objective-C and Cocoa-Touch framework
Created an internal UI library by extending Cocoa-Touch Framework
Technologies used: Objective-C

workExperiences.title: Application Developer
descriptions: Evaluation: Very good
Used  Visual C++(MFC) to develop and create user friendly interface and engine for BlackBerry Theme Studio including SVG Matrix import, application icons hierarchy, and image reload
Suggested new ideas that could be investigated and implemented in the future on both BlackBerry devices and BlackBerry Theme Studio
Solved defects in BlackBerry Theme Studio with attention to usability and flexibility
Organized events in a team as a RCSC Building Representative for over 100 co-op students
Technologies used: C++ and SVG

projects.name: JSON Library
descriptions: Created a JSON Library for Java with emphasis on ease to use and ability to customize
Users can serialize their Java objects to JSON string with as few as one line by using this JSON Library

projects.name: Alloy Visualizer with Professor Derek Rayside
descriptions: Researched and created new algorithms to draw recurrent hierarchies on Alloy including Sugiyama layout and Circular layout, reduced edge crossing for some graphs to zero

projects.name: RTX
descriptions: Developed an operating system in C and Assembly, which has features including memory management, processor management, inter-process communication, and time management

projects.name: Compiler Course Project Designer with Professor Derek Rayside
descriptions: Related different compiler creation techniques learned to create simulator and synthesizer for  a language which is a subset of VHDL using Java, used by over 500 students

educations.degreeName: Bachelor of Applied Science, Computer Engineering
descriptions: Honours: Graduated with Distinction, Top 15 of the class in 4th year
Cumulative GPA: 3.6/4
